body:
Configuration file

To change the default benchmarks please press the configure button (red in figure. Then please choose a config file in JSon format.

The configure file should follow the format as shown in the figure below,

among which name, category, checked, runCmd, time(estimated time to finish running the specified program) must be included.

Customize running programs

To customize the running programs please specify commands in the command line dialog. The command accepts valid commands depending on thr running system

Please notice that the path specified is absolute path to the runing program. After that press the save button to make the settings effective or use the reset button to restore defaults

To find information about available options for the benchmark please press the button next to the reset button.

Besides please notice that the program started setting will be overwritten to default settings after the program restarts
